jobTitle: Machine Learning Platform Engineer - Samsung Pay Data Science Team
jobDescription: This is a great opportunity for a talented and hard-working software engineer to join and build machine learning based products for millions of users of the worlds best-selling mobile devices. The Samsung Pay Data Science team is aimed at representing Samsung's leadership in production-scale machine learning systems. Sitting on top of extremely large and diverse data, the team features a unique seamless synergy between product development and cutting-edge research. The teams research areas include personalized recommendation, deep learning with applications on NLP, user profiling and data-driven user growth strategies. As a young team, we provide precious experience of learning how to build and maintain large-scale machine learning products from scratch and valuable opportunities of working with various stakeholders.  Come join the Samsung Pay Data Science team and help us define and develop the future role of Samsung in the machine learning domain!
